     Award Level: Specific Level
     Membership Level: Gold

Membership Program: MP2
Award Level: Level by Price Scale

Price Scale2: Bronze
Price Scale3: Gold

7. Click Apply Changes
8. Verify in DB
select membership_program_id from PVQAF02.package where package_id=123;

custom_steps_separated.expected:

6.
